body_html:
@R1234A are you using python 2?

AFAIK FileNotFoundError only exists in python 3, so this should be fixed

Also, @R1234A this error is hiding the real bug in the code, which seems to be the following:

RuntimeError: reciprocal is not implemented for type torch.cuda.LongTensor

Did you mean to take the reciprocal of a LongTensor?

body:
@R1234A are you using python 2?

AFAIK FileNotFoundError only exists in python 3, so this should be fixed

Also, @R1234A this error is hiding the real bug in the code, which seems to be the following:
> RuntimeError: reciprocal is not implemented for type torch.cuda.LongTensor

Did you mean to take the reciprocal of a LongTensor?
